I used a bad choice of words when I said robot. It was more of a relay 
satelite for the energy generator our galaxy was created as. And I 
never said a word about SSJ (although I did mention dbz a little to 
much). I realize these were stupid ideas, but if you're going to 
torment me about them at least get the facts straight. And now we have 
the descendants of the Maximals and Predicons, why no the Ancestors of 
the Autobots and Decepticons (and let's stop argueing before Hugar 
blows his top.......again).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Right and who wanted to make his charachters go SSJ and wanted the 
> regular moon to be a gigantic robot for his charachters? Hmmm... 
> Original ideas and very creative if I do say so myself but they are 
> rather dumb IMHO. You really get on my nerves Dewboy and thus I get 
> on yours, its a vicious cycle, deal with it.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > Thanks you're not the first to compliment me.  Not to sound 
> braggish. 
> > I don't think there's a single person here who doesn't desrve 
> > compliments (except Nemesis he's getting on my nerves about the 
> Rocak, 
> > and Shadow Star I still think we should bring in the ancestors of 
> the 
> > Autobots and Decepticons and call them Rocak like with suggeted 
> Earth 
> > history where we evoled from a higher race of people and are like 
> > children with amnesia who forgot their parents).
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > > OOC: Yes, that was pretty good.  Although i seem to remember 
> > Transmutate 
> > > being female, but then again, Transmutate was more of an 'it'.
